    • Method Detail

      • databaseBuilder

        @NonNull
public static <T extends RoomDatabase> RoomDatabase.Builder<T> databaseBuilder(@NonNull
                                                                                        Context context,
                                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                                        java.lang.Class<T> klass,
                                                                                        @NonNull
                                                                                        java.lang.String name)
        Creates a RoomDatabase.Builder for a persistent database. Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the database class.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the database. This is usually the Application context.
        klass - The abstract class which is annotated with Database and extends RoomDatabase.
        name - The name of the database file.
        Returns:
        A RoomDatabaseBuilder<T> which you can use to create the database.

      • inMemoryDatabaseBuilder

        @NonNull
public static <T extends RoomDatabase> RoomDatabase.Builder<T> inMemoryDatabaseBuilder(@NonNull
                                                                                                Context context,
                                                                                                @NonNull
                                                                                                java.lang.Class<T> klass)
        Creates a RoomDatabase.Builder for an in memory database. Information stored in an in memory database disappears when the process is killed. Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the database class.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the database. This is usually the Application context.
        klass - The abstract class which is annotated with Database and extends RoomDatabase.
        Returns:
        A RoomDatabaseBuilder<T> which you can use to create the database.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
